price: (70) And grieve not over them or be in distress from what they conspire.
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُن فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walā taḥzan ʿalayhim walā takun fī ḍayqin mimmā yamkurūna
